description: OEM extension object which contains properties defined by the manufacturer
specification: This object represents the OEN property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification at <url>.  Copyright (c) 2013, Avocent & Hewlett-Packard.  All rights reserved.

^[A-Za-z0-9]+$.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the oem object into sections.
^[A-Za-z0-9]+$.specification: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*
